mapper.select: SELECT sum(if (f.praise_stat =${@ink.whi.api.model.enums.PraiseStatEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if (f.collection_stat =${@ink.whi.api.model.enums.CollectionStatEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount, avg(r.`cnt`) as readCount FROM read_count as r left join user_foot as f on f.document_id = r.document_id and f.document_type = r.document_type WHERE r.document_type = ${@ink.whi.api.model.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@ARTICLE.code} AND r.document_id = #{articleId}
